top.title: Zelensky tells BBC Putin has started WW3 and must be stopped
top.summary: Ukraine's president sat down with the BBC's Jeremy Bowen in Kyiv days before the four-year anniversary of the war.

top.title: Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation
top.summary: Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes, known as "El Mencho", headed one of Mexico's most powerful drug cartels.

top.title: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
top.summary: The suspect was carrying a shotgun and fuel can when he was killed, officers said. Trump was in Washington DC at the time.

top.title: Is £70 becoming harder to justify? The rise of cheaper blockbuster games
top.summary: As top games such as GTA 6 are speculated to cost $100 (£74), some developers are deliberately pricing lower.

top.title: Why fake AI videos of UK urban decline are taking over social media
top.summary: Deepfakes showing grim taxpayer-funded waterparks have gone viral and drawn some racist responses.

top.title: Tumbler Ridge suspect's ChatGPT account banned before shooting
top.summary: OpenAI said the account's activity did not meet the threshold to flag it to authorities when it was identified.

You need to listen to Laurie Spiegel’s masterpiece of early ambient music
Trump says Netflix will ‘pay the consequences’ if it doesn’t fire Susan Rice
